card.cta: Get a key to use Nym VPN
card.title: Use this key information in the NymVPN client
card.cli: Use this command to run the CLI:
card.cliOptions: Optionally, specify the entry and exit gateways below to change the CLI command above:

getCredential.title: Get a NymVPN credential
getCredential.description: Enter the redeem code you received by email or direct message to generate your credential.
getCredential.prompt: Need a code? Sign up for the beta tests on our [homepage](/{{lng}}).

finalSteps.title: Save your NymVPN credential
finalSteps.description: Download, copy, or scan this credential into the NymVPN app. Be aware that credentials expire after a limited period once redeemed.

finalSteps.title: Add the credential
finalSteps.description: Enter your credential into the app, connect, and start testing.

hero.finalStepsAlert: To use your credentials, please ensure you have downloaded and installed the application first. If you haven't yet, you can do it [here](https://nymvpn.com/download).

errors.invalidCode: The code you provided is invalid
errors.alreadyRedeemed: The code you provided has already been redeemed

firstSection.title: Refining NymVPN with your feedback
content: During the alpha testing phase, NymVPN aims to gather essential feedback from our users regarding our core functionalities, user experience, privacy, and security.
Your input is invaluable to the NymVPN team, assisting us in making the service more user-friendly and robust for all users.
Please remember that NymVPN is currently in its experimental stage!

secondSection.title: How Nym will use your feedback
content: ***To gather insights on performance and stability***, ensuring that NymVPN operates smoothly across various devices and network conditions
***To detect and resolve issues***, enhancing the app's privacy and security for all users
***To improve ease of use***, making NymVPN more intuitive and accessible
***To prioritize upcoming features***, understanding what our users find the most beneficial
